ygData.subject: Re: Jaxan's and meditation
ygData.msgSnippet: bah ,, so what if it doesn t affect it ,, they seem to think it does ,,, and I like having songs requested ,, kinda makes me feel needed in a party,, Nokker
ygData.messageBody:
bah ,, so what if it doesn't affect it ,, they seem to think it does ,,, and
I like having songs requested ,, kinda makes me feel needed in a party,,

Nokker Stormsurge
Lvl 21
Rallos Zek

----- Original Message -----
From: J.M. Capozzi <croak63@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 1:25 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Jaxan's and meditation


> From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>
>
> Jig 'o Vigor should have no effect on mana regen, to lay this poor horse
to
> rest.
>
> There's been some reports of client-side display updates being a little
> wonky, side effect of the stamina bar moving on some clients, or rather,
> trying to move. But if you check the hard numbers over any time period,
> mana regen rates are not effected by Jig.
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: John Kim <kim@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 1:29 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Jaxan's and meditation
>
>
> > From: John Kim <kim@...>
> >
> > On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, Jim Mattson wrote:
> > >
> > > Recently, I was grouped with a necro who asked me to sing Jaxan's
while
> she
> > > was meditating. She claimed to notice a *big* difference. Now, I've
> seen
> > > the discussions of how Jaxan's changes the meditation tick interval
from
> > > 8 seconds to 6 seconds, thereby increasing mana regeneration as a side
> effect.
> > > However, the druid I usually group with has said that she doesn't
notice
> > > any difference.
> >
> > Yup, I did some pretty extensive testing of how our songs
> > affect client refreshes, and my conclusion now is that all the
> > Jig does is cause the meditator's client to refresh the
> > meditation bar at 6 second intervals instead of 8. The rate
> > at which mana is regenerated is unchanged.
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
> > kim@...
> >
> >
